channel.title: SQL on console.log('Hello World!')
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on console.log('Hello World!')

item.title: SQL: Count rows in a table without COUNT()
item.description: Use a dummy column Add a dummy column to all rows with value as 1. Print the sum of this dummy column to count the rows. SELECT SUM(ROW_COUNT) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT NAME, 1 AS ROW_COUNT FROM EMPLOYEE );
